website_summaries.verdict: An all-around solid body camera with a range of easy to use features, including an infrared light, multiple filming resolutions, and the ability to take over 10,000 photos.
pros: Over 7 hours of battery life at 720p resolution
cons: Expect to get under 7 hours of usage if you intend to film at the highest display resolution

customer_reviews.title: good video quality
customer_reviews.text: 1 week of testing and everything works well, good video quality, good photos and good sound recording, it is easy to operate, compared to other body camara the price is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Denys

customer_reviews.title: works mostly but zero customer service THERE IS NO 16X ZOOM
customer_reviews.text: STRUGGLED.... TO UNDERSTAND HOW IT WORKS AND TO SET IT UP, INSTRUCTION INCLUDED POORLY WRITTEN OBVIOUS IT WAS WRITTEN BY SOMEONE WHO'S ENGLISH IS NOT THEIR NATIVE LANGUAGE THERE IS NO 16X ZOOM THAT I COULD FIND BUT MY BIGGEST COMPLAINT/CONCERN BEFORE PURCHASING I READ MOST OF THE REVIEWS AND MOST RAVED HOW EASY IT WAS TO GET HELP VIA PHONE OR E-MAIL, I'VE TRIED BOTH MULTLPLE TIMES USING BOTH METHODS, PHONE NUMBER GIVEN "SORRY CUSTOMER SERVICE IS CURRENTLY CLOSED, PLEASE LEAVE A MESSAE OR E-MAIL US AT SAFEVANTSERVICE@HOTMAIL.COM" THEN THE PHONE HANGS UP FROM THEIR END...... I AM COMPLETELY DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS PRODUCT & THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok. Customer support doesn’t exist.
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself works fine and I’m only sorry that I doesn’t have removable storage. However, there are a couple of questions that the manual doesn’t answer. And the support from Safevant is horrific. They have voicemail and a hotmail address, and they don’t answer either. For a “security products” company , it seems more like a garage workbench operation. I’d recommend an established company that cares about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Josephb76

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Some of the recording did not come out all I see is black and no sound. Very unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: the audio is terrible but video quality is great, when there are a lot of loud noises, it sounds like weird vibrations. The regular audio is poor quality as well, but functional. It's very durable, I've dropped it quit a bit but it continues to work great. My last one broke (same make and model) when my daughter dropped it in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price! Good features.
customer_reviews.text: The seller is great. Had a problem with audio and the sent me a new one with out the problem! Video is good it's a fisheye type lens. It's a heavy camera so if you wear it on your shirt it will droop down but seems built strong. The lens has a plastic cover that scratches easily. Good camera for the price. Thank you Owen!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Solid camera. Works great, and the customer service is even better. The instructions are difficult to understand, but if you call Owen at the number listed at the bottom of the ad, he is very patient; he will answer every question and explain everything. There are some optional features that are not functional at this time, but they are things you don't really need. Don't get frustrated. Call Owen after 5pm Pacific time and he will provide all the answers and amazing customer service. Thank you Owen.
customer_reviews.author: Tombstone Luke

customer_reviews.title: It does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I do like this device very much, especially compared to my previous one, which was the side of my thumb, and was outdated by about 10 years. This has a very good charge, the camera quality is amazing, as well as the sound. Takes a little while to get used to it, but its easy afterwards. I do like the option of night vision, flashlight and video playback. I haven't had any issues with this device, and I've already had to use it while confronting a threatening shoplifter.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Cam & Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Body Cam is easy to use and navigate for replay. Good Battery and the bounce feature is Awesome -- picture is steady while your moving all over the place. Alligator clip broke and seller replaced it promptly. Everything works as advertised and it has provided evidence when needed. Every Officer needs one -- if a body cam is not provided this one is a good buy to protect you and keep you safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable camera that is easy to operate and great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid fan of my Safevant body camera and use it daily. It is easy to operate, clips securely, and has a reliable feature set. The video and audio quality are excellent, the menu is easy to operate and understand, and synching files to my computer is easy (I use Microsoft Synctoy for file transfer). The infrared is very good when operating at night and I was surprised at how well it picks up details in the dark. As a security guard, this camera helps document my experiences and provides objective insurance against malign actors. The customer service provided by the company is very professional, responsive, and they support their product and customers extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: AC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Not that hard to operate either. Thanks to the support team for sending me the user manual. "Good Job"
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not that hard to operate either. Thanks I need a copy of the User manual. Email me a link to the user/operations manual for my SAFEVANT 1296P HD Police Body Camera,... Thanks Thanks again for the support team sending me a user manual.
customer_reviews.author: Raynelson51

customer_reviews.title: This Body Cam is Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This Body Cam is Amazing!!!! Use it for work for internal quality control purposes and works great right out of the box! User friendly and was able to transfer and delete videos on my computer connected with the USB port. The only con of this thing is the PTT mechanism. I don't know why they put it there but seller states they are going to make a new future on it that you can connect it to your two way radio. If it does become available, I will be asking a upgrade version of it because that does sound very convenient. Other than that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder clip
customer_reviews.text: See attached adjustable clip for your shoulder. I emailed the manufacturer and advised the adjustable part of the clip stopped holding it's position. They responded immediately and sent me replacements. Their customer service is the best I've ever witnessed. The camera is incredible for the price. The quality is so vivid and so easy to operate. I use it all the time and is the best insurance I could ever buy. I'm in personal security and need this to document any confrontations they may take place. I would highly recommend this to any Law Enforcement or Security Guard. Even if your department doesn't supply you with one the price is so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Camera is great clip is not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, the clip the camera fits in doesn't work that well causing the camera to fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: rich daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Body cam for work and the picture and audio are great. unfortunately the 360 clip that cam with it broke in the first month. then the power/ transfer cord stopped working. I called Safevant and their customer service called me back and promised that its under a 12 month warranty and that they would send a replacement cord and 2 clips. They actually sent 3 clips and 2 cords! That helps alot!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great body cam.
customer_reviews.text: Great body cam, easy to learn how to operate. I do private security and I'm happy with playback features also.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B. Navilys

customer_reviews.title: battery last barile 6 months
customer_reviews.text: i have had about a year and it takes 8hrs to get any kind of charge out of it i dont use it that much would use it maybe for 30 minute use every once or twice a month am very disopointed in the battery .the battery icon in the led screen just shows cositant charging never a full bar am charging maybe the4 th time since i have owned it
customer_reviews.author: lawabiding citizen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice. Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nice. The pictures are really clear, even at night. Picks up clear audio so be careful what & how you say things.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: one of the best affordable body cams i have had
customer_reviews.text: one of the best affordable body cams i have had. stays on clothing with its large clip. easy to transfer video!, audio is WAY better than most other body cams. Night vision and infrared is amazing. Does have ability to take pictures while video is on, and has a laser pointer, meh. Either way, i use this every day at my full time job and so far for almost a year it has stood up to me abusing and using it. Kinda bulky and cumbersome, but worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, has definitely come in handy at times ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, has definitely come in handy at times during a few confrontations at some of the properties I patrol for the security company I am with. I eventually got our boss to order our entire company body cams to issue to all our security officers
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$ for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I’m a property manager and I ordered this for quarterly inspections and when I go to forced evictions. Quality is amazing, but I haven’t figured out how to attach it to myself to make the camera stay straight. I don’t wear a vest or anything so that is my only tricky part I’m still trying to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: angjas97

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this body cam, it is very easy to use and the picture and video quality is very clear. I would have given it a five star if the audio was a lil bit louder. Its kind of hard to hear the audio in the video, but other than its worth it. I lkie that it comes with two different clips.
customer_reviews.author: glamourgirl

customer_reviews.title: 3/5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this on duty for about 1 month. The power button was giving me problems and eventually stoped working all together after being on scene at a MVA in light rain for aprox. 1 hr. Sound quality was bad. Video quality was good. All together not recomended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life definitely doesn’t hold up more than 4 hours. I have it fully charge and once I use it I’ll have it on recording for even 30mins and after couple of hours about 2 hours it starts reminding me that battery is low. I stop using it for work.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Abano

customer_reviews.title: needed in this day and age.
customer_reviews.text: Most security people don't use any cameras. Very happy with this product. With every one using cell phone cameras, you really need this for your protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The body cam
customer_reviews.text: I am a security professional and this is exactly what I needed for video and audio with video option. Works just as I hoped it would .
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Audio is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Audio is not clear as described by seller . You cant even hear or make the conversations out . Video is not everything audio must be a concern and priority. I used this to protect me and my company against fraud with clients and it has let me down I will not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: jesse j monko

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product! I was working at a motorcycle rally ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I was working at a motorcycle rally and you can hear my conversations over the engines, which was impressive. It has a wide viewing angle, which is great when you are looking around. The best part was the customer service I received. My USB wire wasn't working correctly and I called customer service and they sent me a replacement next day. They even followed up afterwards to ensure everything was working. It was, and now I'm back to work!
customer_reviews.author: Alex E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Best personal body cam I've ever purchased. The law enforcement agency I work for purchased body cams that cost way more than these yet the audio video quality as well as the battery life of the safevant cam was far more superior. The ONLY issue is the clips break fairly easy. However the other awesome part about this company is their customer service. I informed them of my issue with the clip and they more than made up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wonders

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, protect yourself
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for awhile now. Have been in various weather conditions. Still going strong! Just wish it had a remote. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing. It has great clarity and is good for theaw enforcement and security industry.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Johnson

customer_reviews.title: needs better battery and outer housing
customer_reviews.text: awesome and good quality but battery doesnt last very long and the plastic housing is falling apart already
customer_reviews.author: Mr P71

customer_reviews.title: The sound is Great
customer_reviews.text: It has a good pictures and the sound picks up perfectly. It takes some getting use to. It's a little to bulky which makes it clumsy on my shirts. There was a lot of user error the couple of weeks. But I think I have it worked out now.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: This camera is one of the best body cams I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This camera is one of the best body cams I've ever used!! It's simple and very durable. Quality of video and audio is A+. I did call the tech number for support on formating and spoke with Owen who gave me quick and simple assistance to fix my problem....he was A+++ If you are like me and having problems with filling your hard drive the first time you use the camera...and can't delete contents of hard drive...there is a simple solution. For Mac, use the disk utility to reformat (and DELETE FOREVER) the hard drive. Beware to haver your data backed up and verified first....this is forever. Power camera up....and should have empty hard drive. Cheers to Owen!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: B Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Very good video and have used several times for work
customer_reviews.text: Had one issue with unit but it was on my end and seller was quick to get back to me and helped me figure it out. Very good video and have used several times for work. Recommend if you need a BWC and on a budget. Excellent customer service, will recommend to all my co-workers and friends.
customer_reviews.author: tcbsr1

customer_reviews.title: Very good to have.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for when i pick up and drop off my child. For security reasons and peace of mind. Very easy to use and very durable. Also very reliable, havent had to use in court yet but good to have just in case. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: alberto garnica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product! Bought it because of a crazy stalking ex-girlfriend...Battery life is awesome. Have only charged it once since I have had it..(about three weeks). Instructions aren't in the best of English but understandable...
customer_reviews.author: Vladdi88

customer_reviews.title: The pics and video are great..
customer_reviews.text: The pics and video are great...and so is the sound. It works great for my needs (i use it as a camera while I'm riding my bike to work).
customer_reviews.author: phoenix762

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, outstanding service
customer_reviews.text: What a great product and great service! Owen is outstanding-he stands out in stellar customer service. Owen is very helpful and quick to solve your question. A pleasure to speak with him. The body camera is a solid product- very user friendly
customer_reviews.author: izzi

customer_reviews.title: To get a brand made in America & I’m Asian!
customer_reviews.text: I returned it approximately 3 weeks ago & waiting for my refund. The camera stated battery would last 9 hrs that I needed & it did not! Had to keep pushing button to finally making it work after 5-6 attempts.
customer_reviews.author: CarmelitaG

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life and picture but the buttons often dont do what they are suppose to. I press record 3 to 4 timea before it turns red.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cundiff

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera and it works good easy to use and there service is good I called them because I had a problem with my camera and they send me another one with in two days thanks Jessy for the new one it works great
customer_reviews.author: Corey joseph

customer_reviews.title: This product has been a great asset to my business
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a great asset to my business, the cameras are very high quality, easy to download and store the videos, and adjusting the settings is very simplified. Having used other similar body cameras in the past, this is hands down the only one that I recommend when asked.
customer_reviews.author: ddiaz96

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I love the durability of this product the camera could be better, but the camera it self is amazing for a body cam. I used this body camera for working security at military basses and public places.
customer_reviews.author: Olympia and Travis

customer_reviews.title: 👮🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it at work and still figuring it all out. So far I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: No issue so far I have done several traffic stops with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lostcause06

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera I had a problem created by me and Owen helped me out 100 percent satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice body cam & easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice body cam & easy to operate. I've worn it on the job for over a month now without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Longstreth

customer_reviews.title: This camera has been absolutely perfect! I work in law enforcement as a Deputy ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been absolutely perfect! I work in law enforcement as a Deputy Sheriff for a small department and this camera was affordable and the quality can’t be beat! The customer service I received has been outstanding. After having a small issue they have sent a brand new one for free!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Meza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these cameras for awhile now. These are great cameras and hold up to abuse from daily use. The quality and sound are excellent as well. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cover your assert
customer_reviews.text: Super cool body camera. Soon as people notice it there attitude changes for the better!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: I was on the phone i had a prolbem with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was on the phone i had a prolbem with my origional camera which was a 32g and i had owen resolve the prolbem that night by returning my call.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep the crazy neighbor from acting out while leaving the house!
customer_reviews.text: Great to keep the crazy neighbor from acting out while leaving the house!
customer_reviews.author: MRJHDRLH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera , happy customer ..great night vision. Good customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: James Ivanisko

customer_reviews.title: Manual is written in Ching-chong English
customer_reviews.text: I bought the recorder and it arrived quickly. The user manual was written in a strange version of English. The manual does not give the model number or name of the recorder. It was obviously made so other sellers could label it as their own. I am having problems understanding the manual. Therefore I give it two stars. The manual said it made a video on how to operate, but I am still looking for that video.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ever has all the features and then some I highly recommended it
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product.
customer_reviews.text: Video works great! the sound is a bit lacking and barely able to hear anyone other then myself. Let me clarify. I can hear my self loud and clear but to hear someone that is maybe 7 -10 feet away. You have to turn up the volume on the player to make out what they said. Note: there was background noise which may have interfered with the audio recording capability. I use this for custody exchange to remove doubt of what was said or done.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Skovbo

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Owen!
customer_reviews.text: Owen was absolutely amazing and helped me out, a great product from a great company that stands behind their warranty!

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only problem is the password no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only problem is the password no longer works. Can access recordings by just holding down the play button.
customer_reviews.author: elias.ibay

customer_reviews.title: Owen was great on the phone
customer_reviews.text: Owen was great on the phone. this cam has great picture and am doing experimental vids to master the use of it. I'm not sure how the video quality is when running but when walking its great....just wish there was a way it would stay on me straight for full straight on view. my question is how are the things on the camera deleted from the camera. since I am old school, I have not figure that one out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple questions and Owen was awesome with helping to answer those questions!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome body cam
customer_reviews.text: Awesome body cam. Easy to work. Love having it on my vest all the time. Owen answered one of my questions pretty fast.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good. Great product at a great price. Small and unobtrusive. Buy this product. You won't be dissatisfied. Really love it

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I am experimenting for now. So far so good. I will add more later on, once I get to know all the features.

customer_reviews.title: Safevant body cam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great body cam! It does everything I would expect it to and I would highly recommend it. It's very easy to use. And if you need any help with anything, Owen is very professional and will help you with any issue you have
customer_reviews.author: Thomas j Todora!

customer_reviews.title: The memory was advertised as 32 GB but on arrival was actually 28 GB.
customer_reviews.text: This product preformed as advertised. I have been using on a daily basis almost a year now and recommend this product. Customer service dept was a refreshing encounter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ramstein  Y

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Video and audio are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Video and audio are perfect. Would highly recommend this to anyone. Customer service is also great. They are available to answer any questions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect. Some improvements needed.
customer_reviews.text: Day-time image quality is good. Night-time image quality is acceptable. The customer service provided by Owen is great. He called me back within hours to answer my questions. However, this camera has some design issues: (1) some buttons (video, camera, IR, etc) are functional only in standby mode. Thus the user has to navigate around the menu system for basic functions. No short-cut. Not user friendly. (2) The 2 IR LEDs are bright red and highly visible. At night, this makes hidden recording impossible. The maker should use no-glow IR LEDS instead. (3) The unit is heavy. Not comfortable when clipped on front of a shirt without extra support.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After seven months, the video's will no longer save to the memory. As of now, it is worthless. I have used this for a couple of days now. I work as a security guard. The price is perfict for someone who wants a great little insurance policy on a budget. It is easy to use and has great resolution. My only small complaint is, the battery only lasts about 7 hours. If the battery could be upgraded to last 12 or more, then it would be perfict in my opinion. As far as customer support. You can't ask for better. I would buy this again and, especially from this store.
customer_reviews.author: Norcalwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Cam is a little heavy,  make sure to clip on your body well.
customer_reviews.text: I use the cam when I deliver with Doordash and Uber eats. The Cam is a little heavy. But the cam works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Butler

product_meta.title: SAFEVANT 1296P HD Police Body Camera, Multi-Functional Body Worn Camera with 32GB Memory
product_meta.description:
Product Description

The body camera includes a number of the latest audio and video processing technology, full-featured, reliable performance, can be widely used in public, prosecutors, the armed police and other law enforcement departments. The device can be timely record the scene, collect evidence, standardize the law enforcement behavior, reproduce the scene picture to ensure the accuracy and impartiality of law enforcement. Perfect for police officers, security guards and other professionals.

Specification

Sensor: 2.0’’ full HD LCD display screen
Camera angle: F2.0 iris diaphragm, 140° wide angle, 16X digital zoom
Video resolution: 2304x1296/ 1920x1080 30p/ 1280x720 30p/ 640x480 30p
Photo format: JPG
Record format: MP3
Battery capacity: 3000mAh
Night vision range: 7M
Working environment temperature: -30~55℃
Protection level: IP66

FQA

Q: How to change and customize the log-in password?
A: Please go to: System Setting--Change PWD--Enter your own password.
Q: After deleting all recorded files, camera still shows ‘Capacity is full and do Not have space to record’, how can i do?
A: To format the card reader. More specifically,
Windows device user: Simply right click the Card Reader, and choose to format.
For Mac device user, go to ‘Disk Utility’ and find the Card Reader, then choose to Erase/ format.
After formatting, new 32G memory capacity will be back for data saving.
Reminder: To have your important data saved/ backed up before formatting, or it’ll be deleted competely.

Importance

1) Considering the needs of law enforcement, all recorded files can be ONLY deleted on the computer via included USB cable.

2) Any concerns, our support team is available at 1-866-380-1888 or at safevantservice@hotmail.com

3) Warranty: 12 months warranty available!
feature_bullets: MULTI-FUNCTIONAL RECORDER: Body-mounted video/ audio recorder for law enforcement with true HD 1296P recording (4 resolution choices). 140° wide angle and 16X digital zoom allow user to get footage clearly and widely. Perfect for police officers, security guards and other professionals.

EASY TO OPERATE: Video recording, take photos, voice recorder, infrared light all can be achieved by this mufti-functional item. Moreover, they can be enabled with the simple touch of a button. Portable size and lightweight makes it easy to wear and carry.

NIGHT VISION: Equipped with high-intensity infrared LEDs, not only you can record videos in daytime, the camera can also capture clear footage up to 22 feet away in pitch-black darkness. Live preview of recorded footage, picture, and audio can be checked by the built-in 2.0” LCD display.

Long Battery Life: The built-in rechargeable battery (3000mAh) supports recording time about 7+ hours at 720P, allowing you to capture over 10,000 images or provide 8+ hours of audio recording on a full charge. IP66 protection level provides it excellent water and shock resistance, ideal for indoor and outdoor use.

Safety: Safevant body camera with 32GB built-in storage allows for hours of footage without worrying about running out of space. Once recorded, you can easily transfer and share files to your computer via included USB cable. NOTICE: Considering the needs of law enforcement, all recorded videos, pictures and sound recording can be ONLY deleted on the computer via included USB cable. Any concerns, our support team is available at 1-866-380-1888.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
